overview: Tom is co-founder of Fettler, Inc. Prior to Fettler, Tom was the Senior Director of Information Technology for medical device companies VNUS Medical Technologies and FoxHollow Technologies, and genomics company Affymetrix. Tom has also held various IT positions at other Silicon Valley based companies. At VNUS, Tom led the global IT activities of the company at a time of rapid commercial growth and eventual merger with Covidian, and was a member of the senior management team. At FoxHollow, Tom expanded and led the IT team through a period of high growth and eventual merger with ev3. At Affymetrix, Tom led the IT team that supported the expansion of the company and implementation of highly complex business and technical systems. Tom has over 25 years of information technology experience, including over 15 years in the healthcare sector.
